name: Drive-O-Matic
description:
This is an infinite runner game, the second game I have made. I am improving every game I make. 

 If you would like to help me make better games, please leave a donation :), it would really help me out, even if it is just $0.50.   

This game was made to be a simple game with simple controls so anyone who isn't familiar with playing games can have fun with this game. If you have parents or grandparents who have never played a game before, have them play this game as they will hopefully enjoy it.  I made the game able to play on a browser because I want anyone to play it :).

The controls for this game are very simple: 

Press the Space Bar, then immediately let go of it, to jump, and avoid dying to try and get a high score. 

Spanish/espaniol: Para jugar este juego,  presione la barra espaciadora para saltar :)

Assets:

The ground tiles I got online from Wikipedia Commons

 I made the player character and the sound effect when you jump.

Secret:

If you play the game long enough you should be able to fall without dying and running the game over screen, but I don't know how long that would take. If you do get to that point, comment the approximate time so everyone can know how long it will take to break the game. Think of it as an added challenge for the gamer out there ;).
